Weicheng Ma

Research Associate, Dartmouth College

Education:
  • (2019–2024) Ph.D. in CS, Dartmouth College
    • Advisor: Prof. Soroush Vosoughi
  • (2013–2015) M.S. in CS, New York University
    • Advisor: Prof. Ralph Grishman
  • (2009–2013) B.S. in CS, Communication University of China
Visiting Experience:
  • (2023-2024) Visiting Student Researcher, Stanford University
    • Hosted by Prof. Diyi Yang
  • (2023) Visiting Student Researcher, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
    • Hosted by Prof. Heng Ji

Grants

The following grants I helped write have been granted:
  • Neukom CompX Faculty Grants, 2023. Epigenomic-Trascriptomic Modeling with Multi-Omic Data and DNA Sequences Leveraging Graph Neural Networks
    • PI(s): Xiaofeng Wang and Soroush Vosoughi
  • Google Research Award, 2022. Culture-Aware Language Models
    • PI(s): Soroush Vosoughi
  • Cisco Research Grant, 2022. Personality-Aware Dialogue Generation
    • PI(s): Soroush Vosoughi
